title: AI Image Generation MVP (Two-Week Design)
description:
Design a two-week MVP for integrating an image-generating AI into a mobile or web app. Focus on the frontend UX, the async backend workflow, and how you would ship a usable feature quickly with clear trade-offs.

Key considerations:
- Prompt input, generation states, and error handling.
- Long-running job flow (polling, WebSocket, or SSE).
- Storage of generated images (object storage + metadata DB).
- Minimal scope for a two-week delivery: core flow over polish.
- Safety and retries when the model fails or times out.

You should be prepared to talk about: UX states, API contract, job status, and what you would defer to a later iteration.
